reviews.sentence: I can not say enough good things about the Westminster Westin. We stay there at least once a month and we love it. We have a very well behaved black lab Lady Bug and our stays meet every ones needs to the best level money could buy. The staff is helpful friendly professional and entertaining. The area around the Westin has plenty of room for lady bug to stretch her legs check out rabbits ducks geese and go for a swim in lake close to the area. We have had several dinning opportunities from breakfast to late night dinners with just a great selection of meals and great prices. we have tried other SPG hotels in the area but none compare to the quality of service we receive at the Westminster Westin. See you next month.

Fantastic weekend getaway. We had a great stay at the Westin Westminster. First class service and perfect amenities for a family of 4. We ate at Kachina both nights amazing southwestern restaurant. Great setting outside with fire pits and nice mountain views. The kids enjoyed the pool hot tub all weekend. I highly recomend the Westin Westminster we will be back soon.

Expected more from a Westin. Nice hotel although I think the maintenance could be improved the bathtub did not drain well in our room and the toilet flush mechanism broke the morning we were leaving. Some peeling wallpaper in the bath. Good amenities including the pool hot tub and work out center. Beds were comfy although would recommend when replacing beds do so with 2 queens as opposed to 2 full sized. Servers in the restaurant were not particularly happy at breakfast. Good location. An okay stay nothing over the top here expected more from a Westin.
Anniversary getaway. Wonderful pool and hot tub great restaurants around. Friendly staff.

Great hotel. Very nice hotel. Stayed with small kids and Grandparents. The rooms were very clean and even though we were placed near the elevators it was pretty quiet. My kids loved the pool. All of the staff that we had contact with were polite and helpful. I would definitely stay here again in the future.

The help is extremely polite. Very welcoming when I checked in out. The room was very comfortable. The hotel is quiet which is surprising since many families with children were staying there. Very nice lobby pool rec area. The room was comfortable and very quiet. Will definitely stay here again.

Great view of the mountains. Came to hike the mountains Westin was the perfect distance from Denver and Estes Park. Hot tub and pool were both great room was clean and nice. Staff was great in getting us in early and helping out. The butterfly house is super close and nice as well.

11 per day for wi fi it is free at the mall. Abysmal parking I walked 18 to my parked car. The Starbucks bartista is always on break. Breakfast not served all day in restaurant Fridge temp set to low had to throw out fodNo vending machines that I could find. No outdoor pool On the positive side all staff memebers I came across were helpful and friendly and the bed and pillows are very comfortable. The Hotel is also very clean.

was not terrible. was not great. The room was good for the one night we were staying. There is free wifi in the lobby but otherwise you have to pay 12 a day which is ridiculous. As they advertised free wifi they conveniently left out that it was only in their lobby. I have stayed in plenty of hotels worse off than this and they all offered free wifi. The refrigerator in the room barely kept things cold and we also had the room air conditioning unit cranked down as low as it would go the whole time we were there and it did not seem to cool the room off at all. The hallways were extremely hot so going from a hot hallway to a room with air conditioning would have been nice but we could barely tell a difference. The staff was all pretty friendly. The pool and hot tub area were nice. When I booked the room it also said it was a high rise corner king bedroom. We were on the 4th floor. Parking was not good either unles you want to pay a valet to park your car. The location to everything was not bad. I would stay here again if it were only for a night.

Very comfortable hotel. This was our second time staying there. Friendly staff and great pet policy. Kachina Restaurant was very good both food and service. Nice atmosphere pool exercise room and hot tub are all excellent and well maintained. Great location. Comfortable rooms. Nice locationwith adjacent park and trails. The Butterfly Pavilion is fun to visit. Shopping mall restaurants movie theater in walking distance. Free WiFi in the rooms would be nice additional daily fee adds up. Pet stations with bags and disposal cans would help since dogs are allowed.

Nice place. Hotel was beautiful beds were comfy and everything was clean. We were very disappointment I booked the hotel for the spa and pool area as we were having a couples getaway from the kids. I called and verified they had a heated pool and hot tub before booking. When we arrived the hot tub was broken and shut down and the pool was ice cold.

Indoor Pool under construction. Really disappointed that indoor pool was under construction since this was a staycation with my two young children. Hotel offered free passes to local indoor recreation pool center which was super busy and about 12 mike behind hotel. Everything else about the hotel was good.

No pool no outdoor spa. I love this hotel. The location is great the views stunning and the rooms and bed are comfortable and quiet. The on site restaurant is nice and the food tasty. The disappointing part was letting my children down when I found out in the morning that the pool and spa were demolished and being renovated. I was not informed of this when checking in and was charged the same price as if this amenity was available to me. There was a sign outside the pool area that said “ check with front desk about swimming alternatives ” but tell that to a 7 year old that ’s been looking forward to swimming and see how well that goes over. The hotel should have been transparent upon checkin and I would have arranged swimming ofsite to accommodate for this renovation.

awesome place. The Kachina restaurant is great the room has a good space and the bed oh the bed is really something. The room view is great as well and the staff is very friendly. I really recomend this hotel for everyone. The Gym and the pool was closed during my stay. I wasn´t counting on that.

Easy drive to downtown. We had a fantastic stay at the Westin this past weekend. My only complaint is probably silly to most people. The picture in our bathroom looked like someone has dropped it in a pool of water and then hung it on the wall. Not a huge issue but my husband is kind of a germaphobe so he was a little grossed out by it. The beds were super comfy but if you are a hot sleeper make sure to turn your ac down. Overall this is a great place to stay in a cute neighborhood and we will definitely be back.
Bed was very comfortable. Pool was a little dirty. Very nice overall.

Pool smells like a pond food pricing OUTRAGEOUS. I remember now why I stopped staying at Westin ’s. I ordered three small ice creams for my family and a diet coke. What would you expect to pay. 10 maybe 15. Nope. Not at Westin. 45 dollars. Yes 45 dollars. Never again Westin Starwod. Also pool was horrible dirty and smelled like dirty pond water. Just about everything.

This hotel was great. If it were n’t for the pooling tub and a front desk person not being able to communicate with my mom I would have given excellent across the board. The tub pooled up to my ankles. that ’s kind of gross. Maybe the fact that we were on the 14th floor affected things. Also my mom asked about a microwave and was told there was n’t one. I can appreciate language barriers but if someone would have called me I would have told them what we needed.

A great stay because of hospitality of staff and l We like staying here for Dave and busters since our city does n’t have one. The front desk rooms lobby and location are awesome. The pool was really dirty this visit have stayed 6 times. Use to have a cool hot tub outside but removed it I guess. Nothing to stop another stay in the future but surprising to have a issue.

Fabulous. Staff were amazing acomodated my kids wishes for room placement. Big lobby with a few comfortable chairs for a morning read before everyone else is awake. Beds and pillows so comfortable firm but not too firm down pillows and comforter. Clean clean clean. Quiet despite a horde of kids staying the weekend for a tournament. Pool was a bit shabby and cold and no hot tub NO HOT TUB. ugh hate that. Really need a hot tub if I must hang by the pool with kids. Walking distance to every meal entertainment tons of trails for walking or easy biking.
